GSD.description:
ALSA: jack: Access input_dev under mutex

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit c093b62c40027c21d649c5534ad7aa3605a99b00. For more details please see the references link.
